name: Triple Words Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Example question: Spatter - beseech - sunbeam
Answer: SPRAY (drop 'S' to make PRAY, drop 'P' to make RAY)

Musical arrangement - centre - metal bearing rock
questions.explanation:
Score & Score core ore.

	Score - core - ore

Strap & Strap trap rap.

	Strap - trap - rap

Amuse & amuse muse use.

	Amuse - muse - use

Scowl & Scowl cowl owl.

	Scowl - cowl - owl

Stone & Stone tone one.

	Stone - tone - one

Splay & Splay play lay.

	Splay - play - lay

Price & Price rice ice.

	Price - rice- ice

Spear & Spear pear ear.

	Spear - pear - ear

Skill & Skill kill ill.

	Skill - kill - ill

Women & Women omen men.

	Women - omen- men
